Title: "In Folly's Nature Revealed"

Prancing on sand, stallion meet, 
Hound in breeze, and mutt’s rug feat.
Dim-wits rise, in nature’s jest, 
Each foolish act becomes our quest.
Graceless gawking, clumsiness meets, 
Life’s humor in brief moments greets.
